subject: Ice Skating
lead_paragraph: The world champion Brian Joubert won Skate Canada in Quebec City, hours after the ice dancer Melissa Gregory was injured in a fall. Joubert won despite jumps that were not anywhere near the quality he produced in winning the world title last March in Tokyo. He tumbled to the ice on his quad at the start. “I’m disappointed with the quad,” Joubert said. Gregory was responsive and alert in a hospital after falling during the warm-up for the free dance.Mao Asada won the women’s title Saturday.
